data.actual_result: In case 1, all UI elements are gone except the menu icon at the top left // In case 2, only some text and profile pictures diseappear // In case 3, it just removes the recent mentions content, but this time the content won't come back after restoring the screen.
data.expected_result: In all cases, splitting your screen should have no effect on any UI elements
data.short_description: (Android 7.0+, possibly Huawei specific but unsure) Splitting your screen while Discord is active will make some UI elements diseappear, until you scroll the screen a bit. Bahavior is a bit different depending on which screen you are viewing
data.steps_to_repro: - Let's consider 3 cases: - Case 1) View any text channel, DM, or friend list - Split your screen using the Android 7.0 feature - Case 2) View any settings page or user profile (e.g Server settings)  - Split your screen - Case 3 (more specific)) View Recent mentions - Split your screen, and then restore your screen back
